Description: NESTLED ON TREE LINED STREET, SECOND AND THIRD FLOOR OF TWO FAMILY OWNER WANTS EXCELLENT CREDIT...THREE BEDROOMS AND TWO BATHROOMS THERE IS A ONE MONTHS BROKER FEE PAID BY NEW TENANT IF APPROVED HARDWOOD FLOORS, OFFICE, SUNROOM, BACK PORCH OVERLOOKS HUGE BACK YARD GARAGE AND DRIVEWAY TO PARK WASHER AND DRYER IN BASEMENT/STORAGE AVAILABLE....................GAS HEAT MODERN FULLY APPLIANCED KITCHEN FORMAL DINING ROOM WITH HUTCH FULL BATH WITH SKYLIGHT ON TOP LEVEL WALK TO #73 BUS TO HARVARD SQUARE IN MINUTES MANY STORES CLOSE BY
